text: Dughiar kamɨn Israelian mɨdorozir gumaziba izima, Ikiavɨra Itir God, Amoria gamizɨ, me atiatigha okam nɨghnɨgha tintinibar ari. Ezɨ Israelia Gibeonɨn nguibamɨn, Amorian avɨrim mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire, egha bar men gɨntɨgha ghua Bethoronɨn nguibamɨn boroghɨn mɨghsɨamɨn zuir tuavimɨn ghuavanabo. Me puv me mɨsogha ghua sautɨn amadaghan Aseka ko Makedan nguibamningɨn tu.
